exercises.name: Abdominal Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on the back, bend knees, lift upper body towards knees, lower back down.

exercises.name: Chest Fly
exercises.description: Lie on a bench with dumbbells, extend arms out at sides, bring weights together above chest.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: Bend at the hips and knees, grip the barbell, stand up lifting the bar, lower it back down carefully.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: Start on all fours, lift hips up and back, creating an inverted V-shape with your body.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Grip the bars, lower your body by bending elbows, press up to start position.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet hip width apart, bend knees and lower down as if sitting in a chair, return to start.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Sit or stand, hold dumbbells at shoulder height, press them upwards until arms are extended, lower back.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Sit at the machine, grip the bar, pull down towards chest, and slowly return to start.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.description: Lie face down on the machine, curl legs up towards your buttocks, then slowly extend them back.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90-degree angles, return to start.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Use a rope to jump as it passes under the feet, maintain a steady pace.

exercises.name: Swimming - Freestyle
exercises.description: Swim using alternating arm strokes and a flutter kick.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbells with arms extended, curl weights towards shoulders.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Lie face down, lift your body on your toes and elbows, hold your body straight and rigid.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Begin in a standing position, drop into a squat, extend your feet back into a plank, return to squat and jump up.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, push back up.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in a plank position, alternately drive your knees towards your chest in a rapid motion.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, hold the medicine ball, and twist your torso from side to side.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Stand in front of the box, jump onto it with both feet, then jump back down.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.description: Slide your back down a wall until your thighs are parallel to the ground, hold the position as long as possible.
